recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients:
Spaghetti
Ground Beef
Tomato Sauce
Onion
Garlic
Olive Oil
Salt
Pepper
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions:
Boil spaghetti
Cook beef with onion and garlic
Add tomato sauce and simmer
Combine with spaghetti
Serve hot

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients:
Chicken Breast
Soy Sauce
Garlic
Broccoli
Carrots
Bell Peppers
Ginger
Rice
recipes.description: A quick and colorful stir-fry loaded with flavor and veggies.
recipes.instructions:
Cook rice
Sauté chicken
Add vegetables
Stir in soy sauce and ginger
Serve over rice

recipes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
Flour
Eggs
Milk
Blueberries
Sugar
Baking Powder
Butter
Maple Syrup
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes bursting with fresh blueberries — perfect for breakfast!
recipes.instructions:
Mix dry ingredients
Whisk in milk and eggs
Fold in blueberries
Cook on griddle
Serve with butter and syrup
